title: Produce 1 million tonnes of wheat and soybeans and 10 million tonnes of maize annually by 2030/2031
description: Increase national food production through FISP reform, irrigation expansion, and diversified agriculture to achieve food self-sufficiency by 2031.
leadMinistry: Ministry of Agriculture (with Ministry of Water Development)

milestones.title: FISP E-Voucher System Rollout
milestones.description: Nationwide deployment of electronic voucher system with 98.5% redemption rate.

milestones.title: 1 Million Farmers Redeemed E-Vouchers
milestones.description: Over 1 million farmers redeemed inputs by January 2026 with nearly 100% redemption rate.

milestones.title: FISP Expansion to All 116 Districts
milestones.description: Expanded FISP coverage from 74 to all 116 districts nationwide.

milestones.title: Presidential Irrigation Programme Launch
milestones.description: Launched irrigation programme targeting 340,000 tonnes of maize production in 2025.

risks.description: Climate variability and drought risk threatening rain-fed agriculture production targets.
risks.mitigationStrategy: Accelerate irrigation expansion and promote drought-resistant crop varieties.

recentActivities.description: Over 1 million farmers redeemed inputs by January 2026

title: Reduce maternal mortality from 278 to 100 deaths per 100,000 live births by 2026
description: Reduce maternal mortality through expanded healthcare infrastructure, trained workforce, and blood supply strengthening.

milestones.title: Maternal Mortality Reduction Achievement
milestones.description: Reduced maternal mortality to 195 per 100,000 - a 29.9% reduction year-over-year.

milestones.title: Blood Collection Capacity Increase
milestones.description: National blood collection rose to 190,479 litres from 130,661 litres in 2023.

milestones.title: School Health Providers Graduation
milestones.description: 1,500+ school health providers graduated to improve child health services.

recentActivities.description: Maternal deaths fell to 195 per 100,000 - a 29.9% reduction

title: Achieve a minimum of 85% CDF utilisation by 2026
description: Empower local communities through the Constituency Development Fund for infrastructure, education, and economic development.
leadMinistry: Ministry of Local Government and Rural Development

milestones.title: CDF Budget Increase to K40M per Constituency
milestones.description: CDF allocation increased from K1.6M (2021) to K40M per constituency.

milestones.title: 63% Mid-Year Performance Rate
milestones.description: Achieved 63% CDF utilization rate by September 2025 milestone.

milestones.title: 130,627 Secondary School Bursaries Awarded
milestones.description: Distribute 130,627 bursaries with near gender parity achievement.

recentActivities.description: 63,388 grant beneficiaries from community groups, women's cooperatives, and youth initiatives

title: Increase copper production to 3 million tonnes by 2031
description: Revitalize the mining sector through investment, regulation reform, and local content development.
leadMinistry: Ministry of Mines and Minerals Development

milestones.title: Geological and Minerals Development Act 2025
milestones.description: New legislation modernizes mining sector framework and oversight.

milestones.title: 890,000 Tonnes Copper Production
milestones.description: Achieved over 890,000 tonnes of copper production in 2025 (8% increase).

milestones.title: Local Content Regulations Effective
milestones.description: Implementation of local content regulations to enhance Zambian participation.

title: Ensure 80% of the population is included in the digital economy by 2026
description: Expand digital infrastructure and services to connect 800,000 Zambians through last-mile connectivity.

milestones.title: 109 ZAMPOST Digital Transformation Centres
milestones.description: Converted 109 post offices into Digital Transformation Centres with modern ICT.

milestones.title: Last-Mile Connectivity Expansion
milestones.description: Connect 800,000 Zambians through last-mile connectivity infrastructure.

recentActivities.description: 109 post offices converted into Digital Transformation Centres

title: Increase live animal population to 7 million by 2026
description: Unlock $1 billion in livestock exports by 2031 through beef sector development and disease control.

milestones.title: First Beef Export to DRC
milestones.description: First official beef export to SADC region from Namwala farmers (55 animals).

milestones.title: Five Disease-Free Compartments Certified
milestones.description: Operational compartments: Chikankata, Chipata, Chisamba, Mumbwa, and Namwala.

recentActivities.description: First official beef export to DRC from Namwala farmers

title: Provide all citizens over the age of 16 with a digital identity
description: Implement Integrated National Registration Information System (INRIS) for digital identity cards.

milestones.title: INRIS System Implementation Phase 1
milestones.description: Integrated National Registration Information System enrollment phase 1.

milestones.title: Nationwide Enrollment Campaign
milestones.description: Nationwide digital ID enrollment for all citizens over age 16.

title: Increase national essential drug availability from 35% to 70% of primary health centres
description: Improve medicine supply chain and logistics to meet WHO standards for drug availability.

milestones.title: Essential Drug Availability 80%+
milestones.description: Exceeded WHO standard - availability rose from 35% in 2021 to over 80% by 2024.

milestones.title: Medicine Financing Increase to K4.9B
milestones.description: Increased medicine financing from K1.4 billion to K4.9 billion.

recentActivities.description: Availability rose from 35% in 2021 to over 80% by 2024 - exceeding WHO standards

title: Reduce the time and cost of trade by at least 50% by 2026
description: Streamline border management and implement One Stop Border Posts (OSBP) for efficient trade facilitation.
leadMinistry: Ministry of Commerce, Trade and Industry

milestones.title: SimpliClear and TLS Digital Border Systems
milestones.description: Implemented digital transformation systems at border posts.

milestones.title: Four OSBP Locations Development
milestones.description: One Stop Border Posts under development: Kipushi, Mokamboa, Sakania, Nakonde.

title: Deliver sufficient, reliable, and low-cost electricity to 66% of Zambians by 2030
description: Increase energy generation to 9,000MW by 2030 through solar expansion and grid improvements.

milestones.title: 521 Prosumers Enrolled in Net Metering
milestones.description: Net metering programme with 15.345 MW installed capacity.

milestones.title: Solar Tax Incentives Elimination
milestones.description: Eliminated taxes on solar equipment including batteries, inverters, and efficient lighting.

milestones.title: 1,000 MW Solar Expansion
milestones.description: Target to add 1,000 MW of solar capacity in 2025.

recentActivities.description: 521 prosumers enrolled in Net Metering Programme with 15.345 MW installed capacity

title: Develop 1,860km of railway, 2,500km of road, and aviation infrastructure by 2026
description: Support economic growth through infrastructure development to accommodate 1.7 million annual passengers.
leadMinistry: Ministry of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development

milestones.title: Ndola-Sakania-Mufulira Road Project Launch
milestones.description: Northern region transportation corridor project initiated.

milestones.title: East Africa Power Interconnector Planning
milestones.description: Planning phase for East Africa Power Interconnector to reduce load-shedding.
